item.title: ‘Is it a case of them or us?’ We’re in our 40s. Do we retire early in our 50s — or save for our kids’ education?
item.description: “We’re both teachers, with a combined gross income of $210,000.”

item.title: Target’s beaten-down stock gets a lift after report of ‘significant investment’ from Toms Capital
item.description: As shoppers dealing with higher living costs continue to seek out bargains, Target has struggled to compete with Walmart.

item.title: Logan Paul’s $5.3 million Pokémon bet raises a bigger question: Do collectibles belong in your portfolio?
item.description: Collectibles may offer eye-catching returns, but not all financial experts are on board.

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: How the New Year’s tax deadline poses a risk for gold, silver and the Dow
item.description: The right time for investors to make a move may be sooner than they think.
